ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, Noah, being warned about things not yet seen, moved with godly fear. He prepared a ship for the saving of his house, through which he condemned the world, and became heir of the righteousness which is according to faith.

block.text: Noa i bilip long God, na God i toksave long em long samting bai i kamap bihain, em samting Noa i no lukim yet. Orait em i bilipim tok bilong God na em i wokim wanpela sip. Na em wantaim meri pikinini bilong en ol i go insait long sip na ol i stap gut, na ol i no bagarap. Long dispela bilip bilong en, Noa i kamapim ples klia pasin nogut bilong olgeta arapela manmeri bilong graun. Noa i bilip long God na God i kolim em stretpela man, olsem God i save mekim long olgeta man i bilip long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, Abraham, when he was called, obeyed to go out to the place which he was to receive for an inheritance. He went out, not knowing where he went.

block.text: Abraham i bilip long God, na taim God i singautim em, Abraham i bihainim tok bilong God. Em i lusim ples bilong en, na i go long wanpela graun God i laik givim em olsem graun bilong em stret. Abraham i no save em bai i go we, tasol em i bilip, na em i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, he lived as an alien in the land of promise, as in a land not his own, dwelling in tents, with Isaac and Jacob, the heirs with him of the same promise.

block.text: Em i bilip na i go sindaun long dispela graun bipo God i tok long givim em. Na em i stap long dispela graun olsem man bilong narapela lain. Em i sindaun long haus sel wantaim Aisak na Jekop, em olgeta ol man God i bin promis long givim dispela graun long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he looked for the city which has the foundations, whose builder and maker is God.

block.text: Oltaim Abraham i bilip na i wet long lukim dispela taun i stap strong tru, em dispela taun God wanpela tasol i bin tingim pasin bilong wokim na em yet i bin wokim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, even Sarah herself received power to conceive, and she bore a child when she was past age, since she counted him faithful who had promised.

block.text: Sara tu i bilip long God. Em i lusim pinis taim bilong karim pikinini, tasol em i bilip, na em i kisim strong inap long karim pikinini. Sara i tingting olsem, "God i promis pinis long mi bai karim pikinini. Na God i save tok tru tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore as many as the stars of the sky in multitude, and as innumerable as the sand which is by the sea shore, were fathered by one man, and him as good as dead.

block.text: Olsem na taim dispela wanpela man i kamap lapun pinis na klostu em i laik i dai, em i kamap papa bilong planti pikinini moa. Ol i kamap planti moa yet, olsem ol sta bilong skai na olsem wesan bilong nambis. I no inap man i kaunim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These all died in faith, not having received the promises, but having seen them and embraced them from afar. They confessed that they were strangers and pilgrims on the earth.

block.text: Ol dispela manmeri ol i bilip long God i go inap long taim ol i dai. Taim ol i stap long graun, ol i no kisim ol dispela gutpela samting God i bin promis long givim ol. Nogat. I olsem ol i sanap na lukluk i go long ol dispela samting i stap longwe tru long ol, na ol i amamas long lukim ol. Na ol i no sem long tokaut olsem, "Mipela i stap long dispela graun olsem ol manmeri bilong narapela kantri. Mipela i kam i stap liklik taim tasol long dispela graun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: For those who say such things make it clear that they are seeking a country of their own.

block.text: Na sapos yumi harim ol manmeri i mekim dispela kain tok, orait yumi save, ol i laik painim graun tru bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If indeed they had been thinking of that country from which they went out, they would have had enough time to return.

block.text: Na sapos ol i bin tingting tasol long dispela graun ol i bin lusim na i kam, orait ol inap i go bek long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now they desire a better country, that is, a heavenly one. Therefore God is not ashamed of them, to be called their God, for he has prepared a city for them.

block.text: But now they desire a better country, that is, a heavenly one. Therefore God is not ashamed of them, to be called their God, for he has prepared a city for them.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, Abraham, being tested, offered up Isaac. Yes, he who had gladly received the promises was offering up his one and only son;

block.text: By faith, Abraham, being tested, offered up Isaac. Yes, he who had gladly received the promises was offering up his one and only son;

ReferenceBlocks.text: even he to whom it was said,

block.text: even he to whom it was said,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “In Isaac will your seed be called”

block.text: "Long Aisak tasol bai ol lain tumbuna pikinini bilong yu i kamap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: concluding that God is able to raise up even from the dead. Figuratively speaking, he also did receive him back from the dead.

block.text: Tasol taim God i traim Abraham, na i tokim Abraham olsem em i mas kilim dispela wanpela pikinini bilong en olsem ofa, orait Abraham i bilip long God na i givim Aisak long God.

Abraham i tingting olsem, "Sapos Aisak i dai, maski, God em inap long kirapim em bek." Olsem na tru tumas, yumi inap tok bokis long dispela samting i bin kamap na tok olsem, Abraham i kisim bek pikinini bilong en long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau, even concerning things to come.

block.text: Aisak i bilip long God na i givim blesing long Jekop tupela Iso. Long dispela blesing em i tok long ol samting bai i kamap long tupela bihain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, Jacob, when he was dying, blessed each of the sons of Joseph, and worshiped, leaning on the top of his staff.

block.text: Jekop i bilip long God, na long taim klostu em i laik i dai, em i givim blesing long tupela pikinini man bilong Josep. Na em i lindaun long het bilong stik em i save holim bilong wokabaut, na em i lotu long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, Joseph, when his end was near, made mention of the departure of the children of Israel; and gave instructions concerning his bones.

block.text: Josep i bilip long God, na long taim em i laik i dai, em i tok, bihain ol Israel bai i lusim Isip na i go. Na em i tokim ol long wanem samting ol i mas mekim long ol bun bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, Moses, when he was born, was hidden for three months by his parents. They saw that he was a beautiful child, and they were not afraid of the king’s commandment.

block.text: Papamama bilong Moses tupela i bilip long God, na taim mama i karim Moses, tupela i lukim em i gutpela pikinini tru. Olsem na tupela i haitim em inap long tripela mun. Tupela i no pret long brukim lo bilong king.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, Moses, when he had grown up, refused to be called the son of Pharaoh’s daughter.

block.text: Moses i bilip long God, na taim em i kamap bikpela pinis, em i no laik bai ol i kolim em pikinini bilong pikinini meri bilong king bilong Isip. Nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He choose rather to share ill treatment with God’s people, than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a time;

block.text: Em i ting, mobeta em i kisim hevi wantaim ol lain bilong God. Em i no laik bihainim pasin bilong sin na kisim amamas bilong sotpela taim tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: accounting the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures of Egypt; for he looked to the reward.

block.text: Em i ting, sapos em i kisim sem long nem bilong Krais, dispela bai i winim tru olgeta mani na bilas samting bilong Isip. Em i ting long dispela gutpela pe God i laik givim em, na em i sanap strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, he left Egypt, not fearing the wrath of the king; for he endured, as seeing him who is invisible.

block.text: Moses i bilip long God, olsem na em i kirap na i lusim Isip. King bilong Isip i belhat long em, tasol em i no pret long dispela king. Tru, yumi man i no inap lukim God long ai, tasol Moses i mekim wankain pasin olsem man i bin lukim God, na em i stap strong tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, he kept the Passover, and the sprinkling of the blood, that the destroyer of the firstborn should not touch them.

block.text: Moses i bilip long God, olsem na em i kilim sipsip bilong kaikai long dispela de God i larim ol Israel i stap gut. Na em i tokim ol Israel long putim blut long ol dua bilong ol, bai ensel bilong kilim ol namba wan pikinini i no ken mekim wanpela samting long ol Israel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, they passed through the Red Sea as on dry land. When the Egyptians tried to do so, they were swallowed up.

block.text: Ol Israel i bilip long God, na ol i brukim solwara Retsi olsem ol i wokabaut long graun i drai. Na taim ol Isip i laik bihainim ol Israel i go, ol i dring wara na i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, the walls of Jericho fell down, after they had been encircled for seven days.

block.text: Ol Israel i bilip long God, na ol i wokabaut na raunim banis bilong taun Jeriko inap long 7 -pela de, na banis i pundaun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith, Rahab the prostitute, didn’t perish with those who were disobedient, having received the spies in peace.

block.text: Pamukmeri Rahap em i bilip long God, na em i helpim tupela man i kam lukstil long dispela taun. Olsem na em i no bagarap wantaim ol manmeri i bin sakim tok bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What more shall I say? For the time would fail me if I told of Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jephthah, David, Samuel, and the prophets.

block.text: Tasol nau bai mi skruim wanem tok moa? Nogat. Mi no gat taim bilong stori long Gideon na Barak na Samson na Jepta na long Devit na Samuel na long ol profet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These people through faith subdued kingdoms, worked out righteousness, obtained promises, and stopped the mouths of lions.

block.text: Ol dispela man ol i bilip long God, olsem na ol i winim pait na daunim ol ami bilong planti king. Ol i mekim stretpela pasin. Ol i kisim ol samting God i bin tok long givim ol. Ol i pasim maus bilong ol laion.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They quenched the power of fire, escaped the edge of the sword, from weakness they were made strong. They grew mighty in war and caused foreign armies to flee.

block.text: Ol i mekim ol traipela paia i dai. Ol i ranawe na bainat i no inap kilim ol. Ol i no gat bikpela strong, tasol bihain ol i kisim strong. Ol i kamap strongpela man tru bilong pait. Ol i ranim ol bikpela ami bilong ol arapela lain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Women received their dead by resurrection. Others were tortured, not accepting their deliverance, that they might obtain a better resurrection.

block.text: Ol man i dai pinis ol i kirap bek, na mama bilong ol i kisim ol bek gen. Ol birua i kalabusim sampela man na bagarapim tru bodi bilong ol, inap long ol i dai. Ol birua i tok, sapos ol i givim baksait long God, orait ol bai i lusim ol i go. Tasol ol i sakim tok bilong ol birua, long wanem, ol i ting sapos ol i dai, ol bai i kirap bek long matmat, na bai ol i kisim laip i gutpela moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Others were tried by mocking and scourging, yes, moreover by bonds and imprisonment.

block.text: Sampela i kisim hevi long ol birua i tok bilas long ol na wipim ol na pasim ol long sen na putim ol long kalabus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were stoned. They were sawn apart. They were tempted. They were slain with the sword. They went around in sheep skins and in goat skins; being destitute, afflicted, and ill-treated.

block.text: Ol birua i tromoi ston long ol. Ol i kisim so na katim bodi bilong ol long tupela hap. Ol i kilim ol i dai long bainat. Sampela bilong ol dispela man i bilip, ol i pasim skin bilong sipsip na meme olsem laplap, na ol i wokabaut i go. Ol i sot long olgeta samting bilong bodi, na ol man ol i givim hevi long ol na mekim pasin nogut tru long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: (The world was not worthy of them.) They wandered in deserts, mountains, caves, and the holes of the earth.

block.text: Olsem na ol i go nabaut na hait long graun i no gat man na long ples maunten na long ol hul bilong ston na long ol hul insait long graun. Pasin bilong ol arapela manmeri bilong graun i no inap tru long pasin bilong ol dispela manmeri i stap namel long ol na ol i bilip tru long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These all, having had testimony given to them through their faith, didn’t receive the promise.

block.text: Dispela olgeta manmeri i bilip long God, na ol i kisim gutpela nem tru long ai bilong God. Tasol long taim ol i stap long graun ol i no kisim gutpela samting God i bin promis long givim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: God had planned something better for us so that only together with us would they be made perfect.

block.text: long wanem, bipo yet God i redim wanpela gutpela samting moa yet bilong yumi olgeta. Na em i no laik bai ol dispela manmeri bilong bipo i kamap gutpela tru paslain long yumi. Nogat. Em i laik bai yumi mas kamap gutpela tru wantaim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: HEBREWS 12

Therefore let us also, seeing we are surrounded by so great a cloud of witnesses, lay aside every weight and the sin which so easily entangles us. Let us run with patience the race that is set before us.

block.text: Ol dispela manmeri bilong bipo ol i sanap na raunim yumi i stap olsem bikpela klaut, na ol i soim yumi pasin bilong bilip. Olsem na yumi mas lusim olgeta kain samting i mekim yumi i no inap ran strong, na olgeta sin i save pas long yumi. Na yumi mas strongim bel na ran strong long dispela resis God i bin makim bilong yumi ran long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let us look to Jesus, the author and perfecter of faith. Who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising its shame, and has sat down at the right hand of the throne of God.

block.text: Yumi mas lukluk i go long Jisas, em i as bilong bilip bilong yumi, na bihain em bai inapim tru bilip bilong yumi. Jisas i save, sapos em i bihainim tru tok bilong God, orait bihain em bai i stap gut na amamas moa yet. Na em i tingting long dispela na em i stap strong, na em i karim pen na i dai long diwai kros. Ol manmeri i ting, sapos man i dai long diwai kros em i man nogut tru, na em i kisim bikpela sem long dispela. Tasol Jisas i no wari long sem em bai i kisim, na em i dai. Na nau em i sindaun long han sut bilong sia king bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For consider him who has endured such contradiction of sinners against himself, that you don’t grow weary, fainting in your souls.

block.text: Yupela tingim gut. Ol man bilong sin bipo ol i birua nogut long Jisas. Tasol em i sanap strong moa. Yupela tingim dispela, olsem na yupela i no ken les long sanap strong, na bel bilong yupela i no ken guria.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In your struggle against sin, you have not yet resisted to the point of shedding your blood.

block.text: Tru, yupela i bin pait long daunim sin, tasol long dispela pait blut bilong yupela i no kapsait yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You have forgotten that word of encouragement that addresses you as sons,

block.text: Ating yupela i lusim tingting pinis long dispela tok God i mekim long yupela bilong strongim bel bilong yupela? Em i kolim yupela pikinini bilong em yet, na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “My son, don’t take lightly the chastening of the Lord, nor faint when you are reproved by him;

block.text: "Pikinini bilong mi, sapos Bikpela i mekim wanpela samting long yu bilong stretim yu, yu no ken ting dispela em i samting nating, na tu, yu no ken bel hevi tumas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For whom the Lord loves, he chastens, and scourges every son whom he receives.”

block.text: Long wanem, Bikpela i save stretim ol man em i laikim tumas. Na sapos em i kisim wanpela man na i kolim em pikinini bilong en, orait em i save givim kanda long en tu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: It is for discipline that you endure. God deals with you as with children, for what son is there whom his father doesn’t discipline?

block.text: Yupela i mas sanap strong na larim God i stretim yupela. God em i mekim pasin long yupela olsem papa i save mekim long pikinini bilong en. Wanem pikinini i stap na papa bilong en i no save stretim em? Nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if you are without discipline, of which all have been made partakers, then are you illegitimate, and not children.

block.text: God i save stretim olgeta pikinini bilong en. Sapos em i no stretim yupela, orait nau yupela i save, yupela i no pikinini tru bilong en. Nogat. Yupela i olsem ol pikinini bilong rot tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Furthermore, we had the fathers of our flesh to chasten us, and we paid them respect. Shall we not much rather be in subjection to the Father of spirits, and live?

block.text: Yupela tingim dispela tu. Ol papa bilong yumi long graun ol i bin stretim yumi, na yumi save givim biknem long ol. Orait mobeta yumi aninit moa yet long Papa bilong ol spirit, na bai yumi kisim laip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For they indeed, for a few days, punished us as seemed good to them; but he for our profit, that we may be partakers of his holiness.

block.text: Ol papa bilong yumi long graun ol i bin stretim pasin bilong yumi sotpela taim tasol, inap long laik bilong ol. Tasol God i save stretim yumi bilong helpim yumi tru, bai yumi ken kisim pasin holi bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All chastening seems for the present to be not joyous but grievous; yet afterward it yields the peaceful fruit of righteousness to those who have been exercised thereby.

block.text: Taim Papa i givim hevi long yumi bilong stretim yumi, yumi no save amamas. Nogat. Bel bilong yumi i pilim hevi tasol. Tasol taim em i stretim yumi pinis, yumi bai kisim gutpela pasin tru. Yumi bai mekim ol stretpela pasin, na bel bilong yumi bai i stap isi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore lift up the hands that hang down and the feeble knees.

block.text: Olsem na sapos han bilong yupela i no gat strong na i hangamap i stap nating, yupela i mas apim han na mekim wok. Na sapos lek bilong yupela i olsem i dai pinis, maski, yupela i mas sanap

ReferenceBlocks.text: Make straight paths for your feet, so that that which is lame may not be dislocated, but rather be healed.

block.text: na wokabaut long ol stretpela rot. Yupela i mekim olsem, na lek bilong yupela bai i no inap bagarap olgeta. Nogat. Ol bai i kamap gutpela gen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Follow after peace with all men, and the sanctification without which no man will see the Lord.

block.text: Yupela i mas wok strong long bihainim pasin bilong sindaun gut na stap bel isi wantaim olgeta man. Na yupela i mas wok strong long givim laip bilong yupela long God na bihainim pasin holi bilong God. Man i no gat pasin bilong God, em bai i no inap lukim Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Look carefully lest there be any man who falls short of the grace of God; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you, and many be defiled by it.

block.text: Yupela i mas was gut, nogut wanpela bilong yupela i pundaun na i lusim marimari bilong God. Na nogut wanpela bilong yupela i kamap olsem diwai i karim kaikai i gat pait, na em i givim hevi long yupela na mekim yupela i kamap doti long ai bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: See that no one is sexually immoral, or is godless like Esau, who sold his birthright for one meal.

block.text: Nogut wanpela man i bihainim pasin pamuk. Nogut wanpela man i givim baksait long God, olsem bipo Iso i bin mekim. Em i laik baim kaikai wanpela taim tasol, na em i tromoi olgeta gutpela samting em inap kisim olsem namba wan pikinini man bilong papa bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you know that even when he afterward desired to inherit the blessing, he was rejected. He found no place for a change of mind though he sought it diligently with tears.

block.text: Yupela i save, bihain em i laik kisim ol dispela samting gen, tasol God i tok nogat. Iso i krai planti long kisim blesing, tasol i no gat rot bilong em i tanim bel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You did not come to a mountain that you could touch: there was no bonfire, no darkness, no night, no storm.

block.text: Yupela i no kamap yet long ol samting yupela inap lukim na putim han long en olsem ol Israel i bin mekim. Ol i kam i stap klostu long maunten Sainai, na ol i lukim bikpela paia na tudak i blakpela tru na strongpela win, na ol i harim

ReferenceBlocks.text: You did not hear the sound of the trumpet or the sound of words. The Israelites who heard this noise refused to listen to another word.

block.text: biugel i krai na maus bilong wanpela man i autim tok. Ol manmeri i harim dispela toktok, na ol i pret tru na ol i tokim Moses olsem, "Mipela i no laik harim moa."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They could not withstand this order:

block.text: Ol i pret tru long dispela tok God i givim ol. Em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If even an animal touches the mountain, it shall be stoned,”

block.text: "Sapos wanpela man o wanpela abus i go antap long dispela maunten, orait yupela i mas tromoi ston long em na kilim em i dai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: and so fearful was the appearance, that Moses said,

block.text: Na ol i pret nogut tru long dispela samting ol i lukim, na Moses tu i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am terrified and trembling.”

block.text: "Mi pret tumas na mi guria nogut tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you have come to Mount Zion, and to the city of the living God, the heavenly Jerusalem, and to innumerable multitudes of angels,

block.text: Yupela i no bin kamap long kain samting olsem. Nogat. Yupela i kamap pinis long maunten Saion, na long biktaun bilong God bilong i stap oltaim, em taun Jerusalem i stap long heven. Yupela i kamap pinis long ol tausen tausen ensel ol i bung na amamas i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: to the general assembly and assembly of the firstborn who are enrolled in heaven, to God the Judge of all, to the spirits of just men made perfect,

block.text: Yupela i kamap long kibung bilong ol namba wan pikinini bilong God, em ol lain God i raitim nem bilong ol long buk bilong en long heven. Yupela i kamap long dispela jas, em God bilong olgeta manmeri. Yupela i kamap long spirit bilong ol man, bipo God i kolim ol stretpela man na ol i kamap gutpela pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: to Jesus, the mediator of a new covenant, and to the blood of sprinkling that speaks better than that of Abel.

block.text: Yupela i kamap long Jisas, em i namelman bilong strongim nupela kontrak. Na yupela i kamap long blut bilong Jisas, bipo em i tromoi long yupela bilong strongim dispela kontrak. Na dispela blut em i autim tok long yumi, na em i no wankain olsem dispela tok bipo blut bilong Abel i bin autim. Nogat. Blut bilong Jisas i autim gutpela tok moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: See that you don’t refuse him who speaks. For if they didn’t escape when they refused him who warned on the earth, how much more will we not escape who turn away from him who warns from heaven.

block.text: Yupela lukaut, nogut yupela i pasim yau na sakim tok bilong God. Bipo yet long dispela graun God i givim strongpela tok long ol manmeri. Tasol ol i no laik harim tok bilong en, na bihain ol i no inap ranawe na abrusim pe nogut bilong sin bilong ol. Orait nau God i stap long heven na em i givim strongpela tok long yumi. Sapos yumi givim baksait long em, ating yumi bai inap ranawe na abrusim pe nogut bilong sin? Nogat tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His voice shook the earth then, but now he has promised, saying,

block.text: Bipo maus bilong God i mekim graun i guria. Tasol nau em i tokim yumi pinis olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yet once more I will shake not only the earth, but also the heavens.”

block.text: "Wanpela taim moa bai mi mekim graun i guria moa yet. Na i no graun tasol. Bai mi mekim graun na skai wantaim i guria."

ReferenceBlocks.text: This phrase, “Yet once more,” signifies the removing of those things that are shaken, as of things that have been made, that those things which are not shaken may remain.

block.text: Em i tok long wanpela taim moa tasol, olsem na yumi save, taim God i mekim graun na skai i guria, em bai i rausim ol dispela samting em i bin wokim na ol bai i no i stap moa. Na ol samting em i no inap mekim ol i guria, ol tasol bai i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore, receiving a Kingdom that can’t be shaken, let us have grace, through which we serve God acceptably, with reverence and awe,

block.text: Dispela kingdom yumi bin kisim, em i no inap guria. Olsem na yumi mas tenkyu long God long em i bin givim dispela kingdom long yumi. Na yumi mas lotu long em long pasin em yet i laikim. Na yumi mas litimapim nem bilong em na pret long em na aninit long em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: for our God is a consuming fire.

block.text: long wanem, God bilong yumi em i olsem wanpela hatpela paia i save kukim olgeta samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: HEBREWS 13
Let brotherly love continue.

block.text: Yupela Kristen, oltaim yupela wan wan i mas givim bel bilong yupela long ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t forget to show hospitality to strangers, for in doing so, some have entertained angels without knowing it.

block.text: Na taim ol man bilong ol arapela ples i kam long hap bilong yupela, yupela i no ken lusim pasin bilong kisim ol i go long ol haus bilong yupela. Yupela i save, bipo sampela man i ting ol i bringim ol man i kam long haus bilong ol bilong lukautim ol. Tasol ol dispela man ol i kisim i kam, em ol ensel. Olsem na ol i ting ol i bin lukautim ol man, tasol tru tru ol i lukautim ol ensel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Remember those who are in bonds, as bound with them; and those who are ill-treated, since you are also in the body.

block.text: Yupela i mas tingting long ol manmeri bilong God i stap long kalabus, olsem yupela yet i kalabus wantaim ol. Na yupela i mas tingting long ol man ol birua i mekim nogut long ol. Yupela i save, yupela i stap yet long dispela graun, na ol birua inap mekim wankain pasin long yupela tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let marriage be held in honor among all, and let the bed be undefiled: but God will judge the sexually immoral and adulterers.

block.text: Marit em i gutpela samting tru, na yupela ol marit i mas lukautim gut marit bilong yupela, bai em i stap klin tru long ai bilong God. Yupela i save, God bai i bekim pe nogut long ol manmeri i mekim ol kain kain pasin pamuk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said,

block.text: Yupela i no ken bihainim pasin bilong mangal long mani. Yupela i mas ting olsem, samting yupela i holim pinis, em inap long yupela. God i tokim yumi pinis olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.”

block.text: "Bai mi no lusim yu. Bai mi no larim yu i stap nating. Nogat tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So that with good courage we say,

block.text: Olsem na yumi ken strongim bel bilong yumi, na yumi ken tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The Lord is my helper. I will not fear. What can man do to me?”

block.text: "Bikpela i save helpim mi na mi no inap pret. Ol man i no inap mekim wanpela samting long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Remember your leaders, men who spoke to you the word of God, and considering the results of their conduct, imitate their faith.

block.text: Yupela i mas tingting long ol lida bilong sios bilong yupela, bipo ol i autim tok bilong God long yupela. Yupela i mas tingting long pasin ol i bin wokabaut long en, na yupela i mas bihainim pasin bilong bilip bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus Christ is the same yesterday, today, and forever.

block.text: Pasin bilong Jisas Krais i save stap wankain tasol long asde na long nau tu na long olgeta taim bihain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t be carried away by various and strange teachings. It is good that the heart be established by grace, not by food, through which those who were so occupied were not benefited.

block.text: Olsem na yupela i no ken larim ol narakain narakain tok i pulim bel bilong yupela, na mekim yupela i lusim rot bilong God. Yumi mas larim marimari bilong God i strongim bel bilong yumi. Bel bilong yumi i no inap kisim strong long ol kain kain lo bilong kaikai. Dispela pasin i no bin helpim ol manmeri i save wokabaut long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We have an altar from which those who serve the holy tabernacle have no right to eat.

block.text: Yumi gat alta i stap, na ol pris i save mekim wok long haus lotu sel, ol i no inap kisim kaikai long dispela alta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the bodies of those animals, whose blood is brought into the holy place by the high priest as an offering for sin, are burned outside of the camp.

block.text: Hetpris i save kisim blut bilong ol sipsip na bulmakau samting, na em i save bringim dispela blut i go insait long Rum Tambu Tru bilong mekim ofa bilong tekewe sin. Tasol bodi bilong ol dispela abus, em ol i save kukim long paia ausait long kem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore Jesus also, that he might sanctify the people through his own blood, suffered outside of the gate.

block.text: Olsem na Jisas tu i bin karim pen ausait long dua bilong banis bilong taun, bai blut bilong en i ken mekim ol manmeri i kamap klin tru long ai bilong God, na makim ol i stap manmeri bilong God stret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let us therefore go out to him outside of the camp, bearing his reproach.

block.text: Olsem na yumi tu yumi mas i go long em ausait long kem, na yumi mas karim sem olsem em i bin karim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we don’t have here an enduring city, but we seek that which is to come.

block.text: Yumi save, long dispela graun yumi no gat wanpela taun i save stap oltaim. Tasol yumi wet long lukim dispela taun i laik kamap bihain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Through him, then, let us offer up a sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of lips which proclaim allegiance to his name.

block.text: Olsem na oltaim yumi mas givim biknem long God long nem bilong Jisas, na dispela pasin i mas i stap olsem ofa yumi save givim long God. Yes, oltaim maus bilong yumi i mas litimapim nem bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But don’t forget to be doing good and sharing, for with such sacrifices God is well pleased.

block.text: Na yupela i mas mekim gutpela pasin long ol manmeri. Na sapos sampela i sot long ol samting, orait yupela i mas givim sampela samting bilong yupela bilong helpim ol. Yupela i no ken lusim tingting long mekim ol dispela kain pasin, long wanem, em dispela kain ofa God i save laikim tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Obey your leaders and submit to them, for they watch on behalf of your souls. As those who will give account, that they may do this with joy, and not with groaning, for that would be unprofitable for you.

block.text: Ol lida bilong yupela ol i laik helpim yupela, na ol i save was long yupela oltaim. Na bihain bai ol i mas tokim God long olgeta wok ol i bin mekim. Olsem na yupela i mas bihainim tok bilong ol na i stap aninit long ol. Sapos yupela i mekim olsem, orait ol bai i amamas na mekim wok bilong ol, na ol bai i no inap bel hevi. Sapos ol i bel hevi long lukautim yupela, dispela bai i no helpim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pray for us, for we are persuaded that we have a good conscience, desiring to live honorably in all things.

block.text: Yupela i mas prea long God na askim em long helpim mipela. Mipela i pilim olsem bel bilong mipela i stap stret long ai bilong God. Na mipela i laik wokabaut stret long olgeta taim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I strongly urge you to do this, that I may be restored to you sooner.

block.text: Mi laikim tumas bai yupela i prea long God i helpim mi, na bai mi ken i kam bek long yupela kwiktaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now may the God of peace, who brought again from the dead the great shepherd of the sheep with the blood of an eternal covenant, our Lord Jesus,

block.text: Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas, em strongpela Wasman bilong ol sipsip, em i bin givim blut bilong em yet bilong strongim dispela kontrak bilong i stap oltaim, olsem na God i bin kirapim em bek long matmat. Na nau God, em i as bilong pasin bilong bel isi,

ReferenceBlocks.text: make you complete in every good work to do his will, working in you that which is well pleasing in his sight. To Jesus Christ be the glory forever and ever. Amen.

block.text: em i ken mekim olgeta gutpela pasin i kamap strong long laip bilong yupela, inap long yupela i ken bihainim tru laik bilong em. Long wok bilong Jisas Krais, em i ken mekim yumi olgeta i kisim olgeta pasin em yet i laikim. Na oltaim oltaim yumi olgeta i ken givim biknem long em. I tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I exhort you, brothers, endure the word of exhortation, for I have written to you in few words.

block.text: Ol brata, mi laik bai yupela i mas putim yau gut long dispela ol tok mi bin raitim bilong strongim bel bilong yupela, long wanem, dispela pas mi raitim long yupela, em i no longpela tumas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Know that our brother Timothy has been freed, with whom, if he comes shortly, I will see you.

block.text: Mi laik tokim yupela olsem, ol i bin lusim brata bilong yumi Timoti, na em i no moa i stap long kalabus. Sapos em i kam long mi kwiktaim, orait mitupela wantaim bai i kam lukim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet all of your leaders and all the saints. The Italians greet you.
Grace be with you all. Amen.

block.text: Givim gude bilong mipela long olgeta lida bilong yupela wantaim olgeta manmeri bilong God. Ol lain i bin lusim kantri Itali na i kam, ol tu i salim gude long yupela.
Marimari bilong God i ken i stap wantaim yupela olgeta.
